hero.title: About Metalloid
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Precision Manufacturing Since 1998
hero.description: Metalloid is a leading precision components manufacturer with 25 years of expertise in delivering high-quality brass components across automotive, electric, and pneumatic industries. Our commitment to innovation and quality drives our continuous growth and customer satisfaction.

meta.title: Metalloid - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1998
meta.description: Metalloid: 25 years of precision brass component manufacturing for automotive, electric, and pneumatic industries with unparalleled quality and innovation.

items.content: Metalloid is a premier precision brass components manufacturer with 25 years of industry expertise. We specialize in delivering high-quality components for automotive, electric, and pneumatic sectors, serving global markets with unparalleled precision and innovation.
